name: Red Square Orange Ground
description:
Red square Orange ground is a fast-paced speed-running game. The goal of the game is very very simple. Collect the white gem at the end of each level.

Disclaimer: This game is still very early into development and it is not anywhere near finished

Controls

ControlsKeyboardControllerMoveArrow Keys/WASDLeft stick
DashLShiftRight triggerJumpSpacebar
